>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/programs/{id}/pause"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Désactive temporairement un programme actif

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"ID du programme","schema":{"example":"clh123456789","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Programme mis en pause avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Program ID","example":"clh123456789"},"title":{"type":"string","description":"Program title","example":"Follicular Phase Strength Training"},"goal":{"type":"object","description":"Program goal","example":"Build strength during follicular phase"},"startDate":{"type":"string","description":"Program start date","example":"2024-01-15T00:00:00.000Z"},"endDate":{"type":"object","description":"Program end date","example":"2024-02-15T00:00:00.000Z"},"isActive":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the program is currently active","example":true},"isTemplate":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this program is a template","example":false},"createdAt":{"type":"string","description":"Creation timestamp","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"},"updatedAt":{"type":"string","description":"Last update timestamp","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"},"exerciseCount":{"type":"number","description":"Number of exercises in the program","example":8},"exercises":{"description":"Exercises in this program (only included in detailed view)","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"exerciseId":{"type":"string","description":"Exercise ID","example":"clh456789123"},"order":{"type":"number","description":"Order of this exercise in the program","example":1},"sets":{"type":"number","description":"Number of sets","example":3},"reps":{"type":"string","description":"Number of repetitions (can be range like \"8-12\")","example":"10-15"},"duration":{"type":"number","description":"Duration in seconds for time-based exercises","example":30},"restTime":{"type":"number","description":"Rest time in seconds between sets","example":60},"notes":{"type":"string","description":"Additional notes for this exercise","example":"Focus on form over speed"}},"required":["exerciseId","order"],"title":"ProgramExerciseDto"}}},"required":["id","title","goal","startDate","endDate","isActive","isTemplate","createdAt","updatedAt","exerciseCount"],"title":"ProgramResponseDto"}}}}}}
 id="program-controller-pause-program-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
